title: Dry eye syndrome
summary: Dry eye syndrome (DES), also known as keratoconjunctivitis sicca (KCS), is the condition of having dry eyes.[2] Other associated symptoms include irritation, redness, discharge, and easily fatigued eyes. Blurred vision may also occur.[2] Symptoms range from mild and occasional to severe and continuous.[3] Scarring of the cornea may occur in untreated cases.[2]
